name: Plastic Panic - The Pollution Solution
description:
Pollution is flooding the world. You play as mother nature... Take your revenge on the Polluters!

---------------------------------------------

Fitting to the theme, you fight the increasing amount of disposables products. Punish all those who carry and drop plastic stuff, which can be USED ONE TIME only. Eventually, the rising plastic will destroy the world, but you can use the natures energy to fight it off as long as possible. 

---------------------------------------------

Polluters drop plastic every few seconds. Killing the Polluters will help you to win the game and get the highscore. Collecting and destroying the disposables will decrease pollution. 

Increase your energy by harvesting plants and preventing animals from eating plastic. You need as much as possible to summon the forces of the nature!

---------------------------------------------

Navigate with WASD

Use a Nature-Force with LEFT CLICK

Use your Collection-Tool with RIGHT CLICK

---------------------------------------------

This is the second game ever designed by me. It was a fun experience to cooperate with such a talented artist. Plastic Panic was created for the Gamejam "Gjl-Game-Parade-Summer". All of the Artwork was drawn exclusively for the Jam.

Plastic Panic was created by 

Sebastian Schulte (Programmer) and Takuma Harms (Artwork)
